name: SimpleMath
short_description:
There are a lot of applications that are available on the Internet to let users to deal with advanced Mathematics problems, while there are also different simple calculators to allow users to perform basic arithmetic calculations. Still there are not many to deal with certain Math problems like quadratic equation, converting decimal to fraction etc. SimpleMath is one to tackle those problems.

Currently, it includes quadratic equation (SimpleQuad), simultaneous linear equation in 2 unknowns (SimpleSimu), decimal/fraction conversion (SimpleFract), surd simplification (SimpleSurd), two-point form straight line calculation (SimpleTwpt), statistic data calculation (SimpleStat) and random number generation (SimpleRand). More will be incorporated in the future.
summary: Applications that handle simple Math problems
